original_text: You are sure that you can teach fools and people who do not know very much. You know that God's Law tells you everything about what is true. Because it helps you to know so much, you think that you can be a great teacher!
korean_text: 율법에 있는 지식과 진리의 모본을 가진 자로서 어리석은 자의 교사요 어린 아이의 선생이라고 스스로 믿으니

sentences.original_text: You are sure that you can teach fools
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 어리석은 자들을 가르칠 수 있다고 확신한다

sentences.original_text: and people who do not know very much
You know that God's Law tells you everything
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 하나님의 법이 너에게 모든 것을 알려준다는 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: Because it helps you to know so much
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 너를 많이 알도록 도와주기 때문에

sentences.original_text: you think that you can be a great teacher
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 위대한 교사가 될 수 있다고 생각한다
